articles.author: Joe Miller, Brooke Masters
articles.title: JPMorgan knew about Epstein accusations by 2006, lawsuit claims - Financial Times
articles.description: Newly unredacted filings include testimony from top executive about Wall Street bank’s knowledge of payments
articles.content: JPMorgan Chase was aware by 2006 that Jeffrey Epstein had been accused of paying cash to have underage girls and young women brought to his home seven years before the bank dropped him as a client, l… [+3241 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Franklin
articles.title: JPMorgan orders senior bankers to work 5 days a week in the office - Financial Times
articles.description: New push to bring staff back includes warning of ‘corrective action’ against those who do not comply
articles.content:
JPMorgan Chase is asking its managing directors to be in the office five days a week and warned other employees not to fall short of their in-office attendance expectations.
